definition: woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: In summer days when the trees grow fast, temperature is relatively low and heat unadequate.
sentences.chinese: 而夏日林木生長旺季則氣溫較低，熱量欠缺。

sentences.english: Intrigued, Mr. Wohlleben began investigating alternate approaches to forestry.
sentences.chinese: 沃萊本受到吸引，開始調查培育林木的其他方法。

sentences.english: Also he would need timber out of the king's forests.
sentences.chinese: 第二是求王讓他使用國家的林木。

sentences.english: The shore line is wooded, olive-green, a pristine cove .
sentences.chinese: 岸邊一帶林木蓊鬱，嫩綠一片，好一個山外的小海灣。

sentences.english: The other is in the lowlands of a leafy south London suburb.
sentences.chinese: 另一處在倫敦南郊的林木蒼翠的低窪地。

sentences.english: The root distribution in soil profile has also large effect on activity of the soil enzymes.
sentences.chinese: 林木根系分佈規律對林地土壤酶活性有重要的影響。

sentences.english: Above the treeline take a grassy path leading steeply towards the summit.
sentences.chinese: 過了林木線之後沿着長滿青草的小道直通陡峭的山頂。

sentences.english: A cool spring above the timberline.
Next, must carry on waste recovery use, reduces to forest-tree's felling.
sentences.chinese: 接下來，必須進行廢物回收利用，減少對林木的感覺。

sentences.english: The flood is caused by cutting too much trees.
sentences.chinese: 洪水是由於濫伐林木造成的。

sentences.english: A fuze delay allows penetration of dense woods and light earthworks.
sentences.chinese: 用於炮彈穿透濃密的林木和輕型土木工事。

sentences.english: Company of strange forest estate did not reply to a charge to front courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 而作爲銷售商的奇林木業公司未到庭答辯。

sentences.english: Protecting biodiversity must be emphasized in tree breeding.
sentences.chinese: 保護生物多樣性在林木育種中必須予以重視。

sentences.english: Orchid Pavilion is rounded by mighty mountains, trees are flourishing, and bamboos are dense.
sentences.chinese: 蘭亭這地方有崇山峻嶺環抱，林木繁茂，竹篁幽密。

sentences.english: Forest germchit is an important material basis for forestry sustainable development.
sentences.chinese: 林木種苗是實現林業可持續發展的重要物質基礎。

definition: Shulin city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
verdant/lush green and full of life
